title: Good Morning Britain's Susanna Reid looks almost unrecognisable in an old school photo
text:
Good Morning Britain's Susanna Reid shocked viewers on Wednesday morning after sharing an almost unrecognisable throwback snap.

During a segment about parents retouching their children's photographs, the breakfast show presenter's shared a selection of their old pictures.

Susanna, 47, shared a school picture on the show, where she sported a voluminous head of brunette curls and a fresh-faced glow, while sporting a polo shirt.

Fresh-faced: Good Morning Britain's Susanna Reid shocked viewers on Wednesday morning after sharing an almost unrecognisable throwback snap

Alongside her original snap Susanna also shared a glamorous retouched version, which was edited to include a slick of red lipstick and manicured brows.

Richard Arnold commented that the dated snap of Susanna reminded him of Andi McDowell, while the presenter commented on her 'good hair.'

She added: 'Apparently, the retouch has decided I needed a full face of make up, let's have a look. I've got a rosy tint to my lips and I think they've decided to pluck my eyebrows.'

Glam: Alongside her original snap Susanna also shared a glamorous retouched version, which was edited to include a slick of red lipstick and manicured brows

During the segment their also aired a selection of old snaps from Richard, Laura Tobin and stand-in presenter Adil Ray.

Susanna is back at work following her stunning appearance at the Pride Of Britain awards, where she looked glamorous in a strapless fuchsia gown.

The appearance at the event came after she discussed her new Daily Mail column during Good Morning Britain earlier this month.

The TV personality held up the front page of the paper, beaming as co-hosts Ben Shephard and Kate Garraway congratulated her on her new role.

Good genes: Richard Arnold commented that the dated snap of Susanna reminded him of Andi McDowell, while the presenter commented on her 'good hair'

The down-to-earth star has vowed to speak candidly about how she juggles motherhood with her presenting duties in her frank weekly Femail column, proving she is' a busy working mum like any other.'

As the trio went through the day's papers, Ben joked: 'There will be other things in the papers to read... your new must read inside the Daily Mail.'

When the headline for her first column flashed up on screen, Susanna joked: "I've stopped trying to be perfect, and so should YOU!"... because I'm certainly not perfect!'
description: Susanna, 47, shared a school picture on the show, where she sported a voluminous head of brunette curls and a fresh-faced glow, while sporting a polo shirt.
